com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location

Class AndroidLocationEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location.LocationEngine
      • com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location.AndroidLocationEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocationListener

    public class AndroidLocationEngine
extends LocationEngine
implements LocationListener
    A location engine that uses core android.location and has no external dependencies https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/location/strategies.html
